Artphoria Documentation¶

Introduction¶

Artphoria is an online platform dedicated to art enthusiasts, both artists and art lovers. This documentation will guide you through various aspects of using Artphoria, from creating an account to participating in art contests. Whether you’re an artist looking to showcase your work or a collector seeking unique pieces, Artphoria has something for everyone.

Getting Started¶

Registering an Account¶

To take full advantage of Artphoria, you’ll need to create an account. Follow these steps:

  1. Click on the “Register” button on the homepage.

  2. Fill in your personal information, including your name, email, and password.

  3. Verify your email address through the confirmation link sent to your inbox.

  4. Congratulations! You’re now a registered Artphoria user.

User Authentication¶

Login¶

If you’re a returning user, use the login page to access your account:

  1. Click on the “Login” button on the homepage.

  2. Enter your registered email and password.

  3. Click “Login” to access your account.

Register¶

New users can create an account by following the registration process mentioned earlier.

Buy and Sell Artwork¶

Buy Artwork¶

Artphoria offers a vast collection of artwork for sale, and you can easily find pieces that match your preferences:

  1. Use the search bar to look for specific artists or artworks.

  2. Browse through the categories or explore featured collections.

  3. Click on an artwork to view more details.

  4. Add the artwork to your shopping cart.

  5. Proceed to checkout and choose your preferred payment method.

Sell Artwork¶

Artists can showcase their creations and list them for sale:

  1. Access your user profile.

  2. Navigate to the “My Artwork” section.

  3. Click on “List Artwork for Sale.”

  4. Fill in details about your artwork, including title, description, and price.

  5. Upload high-quality images of your artwork.

  6. Set your artwork as available for sale.

Art Contests¶

Artphoria hosts exciting art contests regularly. Participating is easy:

  1. Browse the current contests in the “Contests” section.

  2. Click on a contest to view its details and rules.

  3. Submit your artwork following the contest guidelines.

  4. Winners will be selected based on community votes or expert judging.

User Profile¶

Editing Your Profile¶

Customize your user profile to showcase your personality:

  1. Upload a profile picture and cover image.

  2. Add a bio to tell the community more about yourself.

  3. Manage your uploaded artworks and collections.

Uploading Artwork¶

  1. Navigate to the “My Artwork” section.

  2. Click on “Upload Artwork.”

  3. Fill in details about your artwork, including title, medium, and description.

  4. Upload high-quality images.

Conclusion¶

Thank you for choosing Artphoria to explore and share your passion for art. We’re here to support your artistic journey, whether you’re an artist or an art enthusiast.
